issues.title: [MooreToCore] Support for StringType from moore to llvm dialect
issues.notes: Feature request for StringType support, not a crash report

issues.title: [FIRRTL] Crash with fstring type on port
issues.notes: Similar issue in FIRRTL dialect, different pass

issues.title: [MooreToCore] Support for Unsized Array Type
issues.notes: Similar type conversion issue in MooreToCore

recommendation.reason: Issue #8332 is a feature request for StringType support, but no crash report exists. Our bug demonstrates that using string type ports causes assertion failure crash, which should be handled gracefully.
